After 1300 combined hours across Console and PC, I can safely say I've experienced enough of this game to come to the conclusion that this game is a waste of time and money, horrific matchmaking (Wowee, who'd have gathered right?). Hitboxes are awful (Love getting hit when I'm already running away from the pallet) Your teammates in Solo Queue are pretty much always guaranteed to be knuckle draggers. (The bots in the tutorials last longer in chase than my teammates, granted not all randoms are like this.) Killer is basically Stress Simulator, where you'll be pitted against sweaty Survive With Friends that just run Meta builds, it gets boring facing the same perks every game, and not to mention the bully squads that'll just make you want to uninstall, the entitlement of both sides which has created a toxic and whiny community. The Devs that don't care about the health state of the game, just the contents of your wallet, and always make the same false promises and seem to just add more bugs with every update, and you can tell the side they cater for more (Survivors) And the laziness of the Devs as well. Rift Cosmetics that are just other cosmetics with different colours, greed has gotten the better of the game developers, and they don't seem to care unless you're throwing money at them, the skins you can buy are extortionate, either hours upon hours of grinding for in game currency, or about £8 a Skin which is robbery considering the base game is £14.99, constant bugs are rife in this game that they don't care to fix at all, and they keep trying to implement Skill Based Matchmaking in a game where the maps are RNG (I'll be surprised if this works.) Then you have the Survivors that just ruin the game for everyone by Disconnecting when they get found first, or Killers that just slug everyone at the beginning of the game and let everyone die on the floor, don't bother buying this game or playing it, if however you are going to buy it, get it on CD Keys, you'll get it at over half the standard price. This game is Dogshit.

Honestly, if you're here looking at this game, I would say you already have an idea you want to purchase it. If you're looking to confirm this with reviews, the consensus for this game is as follows:

A good horror-genre game. Far more fun with friends. Great developer support (regular DLC's should show this). Easy to play and understand, hard to master. Hilarious moments abound and if you look hard enough, a fantastic and engrossing lore that comes close to that of RPG games. I definitely recommend buying this, Stranger Things Edition should be a fun one, and at 30 dollars AUD, it's worth it. (Did I mention the DLC's were all quite reasonably priced?)
Oh, and while there are in-game purchases, nothing is pay to win, really. Enjoy!

All below rankings correspond to my own experience, not the playerbase's in general.

~ DIFFICULTY ~
🔲 My 90 year old grandma could play it
🔲 Easy
✅ Normal (killer)
✅ Hard (survivor)
🔲 Dark Souls

~ GRAPHICS ~

🔲 MS Paint
🔲 Bad
🔲 Meh
🔲 Graphics dont matter in this game
✅ Good
🔲 Beautiful
🔲 Masterpiece

~ MUSIC ~

🔲 Bad
🔲 Not special
✅ Good
🔲 Beautiful

~ STORY ~

🔲 This game has no story
🔲 Like playing Temple Runners for the story
✅ It's there for the people who want it (notes, diaries, killer and survivor backstories etc.)
✅ Well written
🔲 Epic story
🔲 Imagine Kingdom Hearts but on crack

~ PRICE ~

🔲 Free
🔲 Underpriced
✅ Perfect Price
🔲 Could be cheaper
🔲 Overpriced
🔲 Complete waste of money

~ REQUIREMENTS ~

🔲 You can run it on a microwave
✅ Average
🔲 High end
🔲 NASA computer

~ LENGTH ~

✅ Very Short (0 - 3 hours) (each game lasts around 20-30 minutes if you play well)
🔲 Short (3 - 15 hours)
🔲 Average (15-50 hours)
🔲 Long (50-90 hours)
🔲 Extremely long (90-110 hours)
🔲 No ending

~ FUN ~

🔲 I'd rather watch paint dry
🔲 Hard to enjoy
🔲 Repetitive
✅ Actually pretty enjoyable
✅ Ride of your life (for the jumpscare moments)

~ REPLAYABILITY~

🔲 It's a one-time experience
🔲 Only for achievements
🔲 If you wait a few months/years
🔲 Definitely
✅ Infinitely replayable (regular new content further proves this)

~ WORTH BUYING ~

🔲 No
🔲 Wait for sale
✅ Yes

Dead By Daylight est un jeu que je veux depuis longtemps maintenant. Il ne m'a pas déçu, au contraire c'est un jeu génial que je recommande, dès que je peux faire une partie avec mes ami.e.s je le fait sans hésiter tellement on passe un bon moment ! en a peine 10h de jeu j'ai bien avancé, je suis meilleur et j'ai Clodette au niveau 15. Le rythme au quel j'avance me plait, c'est ni trop rapide ni trop long. je n'ai vraiment rien de mauvais a dire sur ce jeu ???? même sinc'est un jeu classé horreur on s'amuse en y jouant, du moins moi c'est mon cas. je recommande totalement, il vaux ces 20euros !!
Эрен Йегаааааааааааааааааааааааа!!!!!!!!!

マッチングが遅い、バグが多いことを除けばゲームルールも非常に面白く、神ゲーです。新キラー実装よりバグの修正に専念してくれれば評価が上がると思います。
感谢杀机制作组，让我完美的拥有了情绪管控能力，顺便还让我发现需要换一个新鼠标了。打了一下午屠排到的人类基本上没有多少和我一样白段的，把把绿紫加上一点红。行吧，看来zzz觉得我这种萌新就该被人皇暴打吧。游戏不错，匹配让人脑溢血，什么人类蹲起手电嘲讽就不提了，一下午直接被打到心态爆炸。新手玩屠一定要心理素质强，别被游戏玩了。不能像我这样，心态炸到整的鼠标差不多快被捏坏了。
